item.title: Run glibc Applications on Alpine
item.description: The Problem Alpine is musl-based, however most existing applications are glibc-based. Rebuilding everything with musl is an ideal and clean solution, but that be not practical (e.g. sources/dependencies are not availalbe) or not economical (e.g. not enough resources or in a tight schedule) or other reasons. Let’s face it, alpine/musl is good (size, security, …) but we still need to run glibc-apps on alpine. There are bunch of solutions already:
